name: broodROM Business Edition

screenshots.caption: Extended power menu with quick reboot and screenshot function
The business edition bootanimation I created

short_description:
This rom is for Samsung Galaxy S Plus (i9001) only, it's the little brother of broodROM, but runs on stock kernel / theme, This rom allows all possible business related actions (such as using the car charging cradle). but don't make this stock look fool you, it has great performance, additional mods, tweaks and apps, also the gps works very good (adjust the gps.conf file to your country using my GPS Configuration tool). 

So are you interested in a stable bug-free rom which is capable for business environments? Get it now!

* A business environment is not required for full satisfaction * ;)
summary: The most powerful i9001 rom for business environments.
